Name: Elkaar
Review Text: I love the location and the atmosphere. The food is good, but sometimes a little 80's in it's haute cuisine style (ice cream of things that aren't usually ice cream, foams, crumbles etc). It seems to me that they're not quite innovative ‚Ä¶

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: The best experience !!!! Isabel and Rob were incredibly kind and pleasant. The food couldn‚Äôt have been better. The ambiance was amazing. I am so thrilled and can‚Äôt wait to go back soon! xx

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: I had my birthday dinner yesterday at Elkaar restaurant, this restaurant is very modern and friendly.  We ordered 5 course dinner and all the dishes were tasty and delicious. I made a video in my youtube channel you can search ‚ÄúAmsterdam travel Elkaar‚Äù to find out that video in YouTube

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Very nice ambiance, small cozy place.  It not noisy so a good place for a nice conversation. We had the chefs menu with 5 dishes. 3 of them were good 2 of them were great. Very friendly staff and great value for what the served.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: I‚Äôve been looking forward to visit BijElkaar for a long time. The food was amazing and worthy of the Bib. The experience however was horrible. We‚Äôve been in the restaurant from 19:00 till 23:30 (waiting on 6 courses). The time between the ‚Ä¶

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: A must whether you are local or on tour!  Absolutely 5*.  Each component of each dish was beautifully and complexly flavoured and when combined with one another they provided absolute delights.  The service and atmosphere were fantastic.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Excellent French cuisine. Excellent price. The staff and chef were so friendly. I highly recommend this spot, you will not be dissapointed. Taste and presentation second to none.  You may want to call ahead to reserve as it is intimate in ‚Ä¶

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: A very nice restaurant that has been awarded a Bib-Gourmand. Exceptional pricing with very attentive staff. Really enjoyed the chef's menu. There is a large terrace out front with a pleasant view. Great place to escape the otherwise crowded city center.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Excellent small restaurant with a great chef's selection. The staff were very friendly and the atmosphere was casual but for special occasions. Excellent value.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Food was incredible - nicely presented and delicious. Very welcoming staff. I recommend it to anyone visiting Amsterdam.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Was by far the most wonderful, delicious, warm restaurant we have visited in Amsterdam.  Food presentation and quality was top notch.  Highly recommend Elkaar to anyone wanting a memorable dinner.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: A small restaurant with an exceptionally high level of cuisine and quality.  Very friendly service and a very good price-quality ratio.  The chairs are uncomfortable for men who have grown normally.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: very cost place with excellent food & service. Tried two course menu lunch there and the food taste great!

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: One of my brother Eric's favorite dining experiences with my sister-in-law Deb. I loved the customer service and professionalism!

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Delicious, beautifully plated food in cozy, arty space. Wine selection and service were excellent. So happy to have found this place.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: We had an amazing experience! Great flavours, creative combinations of aromas and textures.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Delicious and looking fabulous, art on a plate! The atmosphere is cozy and intimate.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Very nice restaurant with interesting artworks. Very nice staff. Interesting favour combinations and surprising dishes.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Service is fantastic. Very kind host. Food is beyond expectations. Everything just perfect

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Delicious and well served dishes! Staff is super nice and welcoming!

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: The food was beautifully presented, DELICIOUS & the wait staff were lovely & knowledgeable but the pace of the courses almost ruined the night. 5 hours for 5 courses is insane. I have to say though, the price to quality ratio saved the day. ‚Ä¶

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: It's a very good place. With nice food and hospitality.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: High end restaurant with long explanations accompanying each dish.  Small portions but lots of courses.  Everything is tasty, although a few dishes were a bit too subtle or small for me to appreciate in proportion to the explanation.  Still, I enjoyed it.  Good wine selection, exemplary service.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Recently we bought a 4 course meal to eat at home - both veggie and non-veggie. The starters and desserts were beautifully presented in separate containers - although cycling home didn't help the presentation. The bread and cheese courses ‚Ä¶

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: My mom and I had the chef's menu of 5 plates and were very content with the flavors!! It's a nice place to enjoy fine dining in a cozy, low key atmosphere.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Have been walking past this restaurant for years without realizing the little gem that it is. Around the corner from my house. Visited cause a colleague told me I had to try it and I was not disappointed. Very interesting menu with unique ‚Ä¶

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Really nice dining, with a choice of 3/4/5 lovely and original courses, good wines and with superfriendly service. Some dishes hold absolutely amazing taste explosions. The plate decoration is stunning. They keep up the same high quality level for some time now and should be eligible for a Michelin star.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Booked for two and mentioned it was for an anniversary meal. They reserved us the best seat in the house and made it that extra bit special for us. Food was beyond superb and so was the wine pairing. The staff was lovely, and we honestly ‚Ä¶

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Absolutely a MUST visit restaurant. We had 7-course dinner and everything was incredibly delicious!

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: On our first night in ams we arrived from our nearby hotel only 30 minutes before closing. They reopened the kitchen for us and served a delicious three course meal  with artistic presentation and with gracious service. This is a sweet place serving beautiful food at a reasonable price. Wonderful!

Name: Elkaar

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Great fresh dishes with seasonal ingredients. Very good presentation, creative dishes and good interesting flavors. The service is friendly, helpful and efficient. The restaurant is located in a lovely corner with outdoor sitting. Recommended.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: I had a lovely dinner sitting outside of the restaurant, somewhat more pricier for the portion sizes but the flavours were enjoyable. And my partner whom is a picky eater enjoyed their foie gras very much. And myself not being a big fan of ‚Ä¶

Name: Elkaar
Review Text:
As a local we enjoyed Elkaar. Food is usually perfect (risotto, duck, lamb ...) serving efficient, family style. Wine selection is good for the price range.
I can not forget the " mango lasagne" desert.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Loved it!  The food is a bit gourmet and fancy but really great prices for what you get.  Very reasonably priced and delicious wines too.  I would definitely come back!!

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Beautifully served food. I would recommend the complete menu with 5 different dishes which the shef selects. Friendely and professional. I loved this place. For sure we are going back soon.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Fantastic cosy restaurant. Original flavors across their menu, very genuine staff. Highly recommended

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Food was very good and agree with other reviewers that this is a value for money place. Worth a visit indeed but I have to say the services were a bit slow but I guess this is French speed.

Name: Elkaar
Review Text: Best restaurant in town!  Excellent food, great service and the nicest restaurant owners I now!
